scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && echo 'Build complete! Minified files created.'
scripts.optimize:images: echo 'Optimizing images...' && find images -type f \( -name '*.jpg' -o -name '*.jpeg' -o -name '*.JPG' -o -name '*.JPEG' \) -exec sips -Z 1920 {} \;
scripts.backup:images: mkdir -p images/backup && cp -R images/*.{jpg,jpeg,png,JPG,JPEG,PNG} images/backup/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Images backed up to images/backup/'
scripts.stats: echo '=== File Sizes ===' && du -sh css/*.css js/*.js images/* 2>/dev/null | sort -h
scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode - serving at http://localhost:8000' && python3 -m http.server 8000
scripts.help:
echo 'Available scripts:
  npm run install:tools - Install minification tools
  npm run build - Minify CSS and JS
  npm run optimize:images - Optimize images (with backup)
  npm run backup:images - Backup original images
  npm run stats - Show file sizes
  npm run dev - Start dev server'
